name: Pog Racers
description:
THIS IS A SCHOOL PROJECT AND NO MONEY WILL BE MADE FROM THIS. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED TO DISNEY.

The project was built for the Oculus Quest 2

The player’s goal in Pog Racers is to place first while racing against AI in a flying vehicle on a point-to-point (i.e. non-looped) racetrack. The player wins the game when they achieve first place at the end of the race, and they lose when they achieve any other position. The gameplay is inspired by a variety of racing games, but notably Star Wars Episode I: Racer, Redout, Wipeout and F-Zero
